root.name: Sneakers
root.description: Plot The game starts out with Apollo and his gang trying to find the culprits behind their missing food. After finding out that rats took it, they encounter a friend of theirs named Bonnie. Bonnie is worried about her brother, Tiki, who has gone missing after playing outside. The gang agrees to help her. CharactersApollo - A white mouse with a red jacket. He is the hero.Brutus - A friend of Apollo. He has a beard.Watt - Another friend of apollo. He wears a vest.Pete - Yet another member of Apollo's crew. He wears a green sweatshirt.Bonnie - A female mouse. Her brother has gone missing.Tiki - Bonnie's brother.
